TextView.android:text: Hi Francis! Let's walk you through your Clearance
Start your clearance by downloading clearance form ask to get your results status.
Upload all your deparmental related documents
Upload all your Faculty related documents
Upload all your Library related documents
Start your security clearance and check to see if you have no issues with Security
Pay NGN 1,000 and get your NYSC temporal ID card.
Pay NGN 5,000 and get your ALumni Related Materials.
Download Form from Bursary to confirm school fees payment and upload school fees receipt for Confirmation.
